column1: "description": "The table shows the Average Age of Angan Wadi Workers (AWWs) and distribution of Angan Wadi Workers (AWWs) by marital status. Most of the AWWs are in the age group (28-49) years; with the average age being 39 years. In Orissa
column2: the percentage of unmarried AWWs was the highest."
